sentences.en: He had been deeply affected by the sudden death of his father-in-law.
sentences.cn: 岳父的猝死使他十分伤心。

sentences.en: Hearing can be affected by ear wax blocking the ear canal.
sentences.cn: 耳垢堵塞耳道可能会影响听力。

sentences.en: His reason had been permanently affected by what he had witnessed.
sentences.cn: 他所目睹的那一幕永久性地影响了他的神智。

sentences.en: Manufacturing processes may be affected by the functionality of the product.
sentences.cn: 生产过程可能要受到产品设计目的的影响。

sentences.en: She had an affected air and a disdainful look.
The affected skin turns red and may blister.
sentences.cn: 受感染的皮肤会变红，还有可能起水疱。

sentences.en: The voice was patronizing and affected, the accent artificial.
sentences.cn: 声音拿腔拿调的，听上去矫揉造作。

sentences.en: There was never any real danger of the children being affected.
sentences.cn: 并不存在儿童受到感染的切实危险。

sentences.en: This has profoundly affected my life.
sentences.cn: 这给我的生活带来了深刻的影响。

sentences.en: Ultimately, Bismarck's revisionism scarcely affected or damaged British interests at all.
sentences.cn: 从根本上说，俾斯麦的修正主义几乎未对英国的利益造成一丝一毫的影响或损害。

sentences.en: Use a crepe bandage to support the affected area.
Use the applicator to apply cream to the affected area.
sentences.cn: 用涂药器把药膏抹在感染部位。

sentences.en: Vitamins in solution are more affected than those in solid foods.
sentences.cn: 溶液里的维生素比固体食物里的维生素受到的影响更大。

sentences.en: Water supplies and other public utilities were badly affected.
sentences.cn: 供水以及其他公用事业受到了严重影响。

words.tran_cn: 令人感动地；令人伤心地
受到影响的；做作的；假装的

phrases.tran_cn: 疫区；受影响区；被影响地区
热影响区，高热影响区（焊接件的）

trans.tran_cn: 感动的，受到影响的，（人或行为）假装的，倾向于…的
影响( affect的过去式和过去分词 )，假装，感动，（疾病）侵袭
影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）
